__e: * When we return home to our wives and families *
Let me tell you something about that greaseball cocksucker.
You lying sack of shit! - What?
He's a lying slag, he's a grass, and you know it.
Lying rat fuck. He made me do it.
Your brother really is a nutcase.
Let me tell you something about that greaseball cocksucker.
BeJesus you're a fussy bloody black.
She said you're a son of a bitch, and she regrets the day she met you.
That piece of shit hasn't spent one legal day in his life.
Jesus! I killed the bastard. I wouldn't take it back if I could.
That son of a bitch burned my house!
You know what this cocksucker did?
Some motherfucker stole my pictures and I don't know what fuckin' happened!
That dumb schmuck only came up with two bills because I booked him?
Then the son of a bitch died.
If that son of a bitch is in there there is no way out.
You bastards think you can get away with this?
But the twisted bastard that you are, you wanted to show it to her mother.
Oh, man, you're a real asshole. You know that?
Hell, just a minute ago you were asking me to kill you.
No. Whatever my private opinion of the bastard is, he's still my first-class ticket to where I want to get to.
That sucker really had some moves on him.
